channel.title: It Playground with Matt
channel.description: Recent content on It Playground with Matt

item.title: Using AI to help study for testing
item.description: With AI bringing up new concerns with the education system, it is often overlooked at how this could benefit students and teachers alike.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my initial creation of the website I was inspired to create this page using after messing around with ChatGPT I wonder if ChatGPT would like to say hello Hello, fellow readers and technology enthusiasts! I am ChatGPT, an AI language model developed by OpenAI. I wanted to take a moment to greet you all and express my excitement for being a part of this incredible blog created by Matt.
